title: Running `npm install` on a new Next.js project created from the CLI can create an unnecessarily large `diff`

labels.name: create-next-app
labels.description: Related to our CLI tool for quickly starting a new Next.js application.

body:
### Link to the code that reproduces this issue

https://github.com/hamirmahal/large-next-diff

### To Reproduce

1. Run
```
npx create-next-app@latest
```
2. Run an install command, e.g.,
```
npm install eslint
```

### Current vs. Expected behavior

# Current behavior
There is a large `diff`.
```diff
diff --git a/package-lock.json b/package-lock.json
index b07f4ca..6c13e33 100644
--- a/package-lock.json
+++ b/package-lock.json
@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
         "@types/node": "^20",
         "@types/react": "^19",
         "@types/react-dom": "^19",
-        "eslint": "^9",
+        "eslint": "^9.32.0",
         "eslint-config-next": "15.4.5",
         "tailwindcss": "^4",
         "typescript": "^5"
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index 79b4ae7..532ee0c 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -9,19 +9,19 @@
     "lint": "next lint"
   },
   "dependencies": {
+    "next": "15.4.5",
     "react": "19.1.0",
-    "react-dom": "19.1.0",
-    "next": "15.4.5"
+    "react-dom": "19.1.0"
   },
   "devDependencies": {
-    "typescript": "^5",
+    "@eslint/eslintrc": "^3",
+    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4",
     "@types/node": "^20",
     "@types/react": "^19",
     "@types/react-dom": "^19",
-    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4",
-    "tailwindcss": "^4",
-    "eslint": "^9",
+    "eslint": "^9.32.0",
     "eslint-config-next": "15.4.5",
-    "@eslint/eslintrc": "^3"
+    "tailwindcss": "^4",
+    "typescript": "^5"
   }
 }
```

# Expected Behavior

The `diff` is minimal, and users of Next.js experience less noise.


### Provide environment information

```bash
$  npx --no-install next info
/bin/sh: 1: yarn: not found

Operating System:
  Platform: linux
  Arch: x64
  Version: #27~24.04.1-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Tue Jul 22 17:38:49 UTC 2
  Available memory (MB): 32036
  Available CPU cores: 8
Binaries:
  Node: 22.16.0
  npm: 11.4.2
  Yarn: N/A
  pnpm: 10.12.4
Relevant Packages:
  next: 15.4.5 // Latest available version is detected (15.4.5).
  eslint-config-next: 15.4.5
  react: 19.1.0
  react-dom: 19.1.0
  typescript: 5.8.3
Next.js Config:
  output: N/A
```
